values: Yea, don't quite remember that happening!   PLUS, Connor can occupy himself, he needs to learn that, if i was laying on the couch, I put him in there to play.  Not to ignore him, maybe you should talk to me before posting something like that.  Maybe? Eh?

Milwaukee is sounding better and better.

With all my heart, eat shit assholes.

My son is walking (cute)

My boyfriend is coming back (he's going to save my reputation.  I'm hilarious, i know).. oh (stoked)

... my life is full of surprises, what's in store for me next?



My hair needs to be done.  Good thing I have an appointment friday, what to do oh what to do.

Jesus fucking christ, if people don't want me at their house, why the hell don't they tell me and I will proudly walk out and leave.  

People need to learn that if you're drunk off your ass making a fool out of yourself, you're going to get picked on.  That simple.  Don't flip out and get all paranoid and pissed.  I'm a nice person, I just enjoy expressing what I think about people and i'll tell them straight to their faces.  Is that so bad?  I don't think so.  But other people do.. ah well.

And I feel terrific about knocking some kid in the face.  Especially when he wishes death upon my son.  Grant it, it was awhile ago but I never showed him what I thought about it and him.  And pushing my sister only makes it worse haha.  I think it's hilarious, and anyone that wants to hate me and be pissed off can go stick their thumbs up their asses and go on thinking their awesome.  

OHHHH LAWWD

Everyones getting out these days,




I want out too.

Things I hate:
1. People.  They're nothing but liars, backstabbers, pushovers, sluts, and disrespectful assholes.

2. Indiana.  Cold, stupid, and boring.


3. Life itself is pretty much a downer too.


4. Downers.



 It's times like this where I wish I could just move far away and forget everyone/everything.   I hate being known, and I hate knowing.  I rather start over.. starting over would be awesome.  I'd teach myself not to be something I hate (a liar, a backstabber, a pushover, disrespectful...  im not a slut. fucker.)  But im stuck here having to deal with it.  

fuck it, i hate everyone and everything and rather eat shit and wash it down with piss than have to deal with all this nonsense.

It's sucks knowing that I don't know.  If that makes any sense.  I don't know if im vunerable or naive.  Maybe i'm both, or neither, maybe just stupid.   I hate doing this to myself, but I guess life comes with a lot of stupid shit like this, and they are just life lessons.  I hate it.  Why can't everything be certain, why can't you just know things like this right off the bat. 


  Tomorrow is going to suck.  I have to go in and get pre-cancerous cells destroyed, and I have no idea if it's going to hurt or not.  But it's something that has to be done or else things can progress into much serious matters.  My life is full of fucking surprises and let downs.  I wonder when things will start looking up for me. I really hope soon.

 So I guess i'm just going to go ahead and get my GED.  I'm 18 and too far behind to even graduate this year.  I rather just get my GED get started with college and get a career going.  I deserve that, and so does Connor.  He deserves every good thing.  I want to give him a life that he will never regret.  I want to give him happiness and joy.


 I want happiness too.  In a romantic sort of way.  Haha, gay.  But it's true, i'm sure it's what every girl wants though.  I'm still young, but mentally i'm old.  I really want a stable relationship, somebody to look after me (just me, Connor has a father) I want someone that will at least accept the fact that I have a son, by another person.  I want someone that will accept Connor, as a person. GOD i'm so gay.


Applications can be sent to me.  <3

Well I did the unthinkable.  Something no one saw coming, something that had to be done for my sake. For my sons sake.  For my happiness.  

Now, I just don't know what i'm doing right NOW, don't know how to go about it, don't even know what to think about it.  But, you know, i'd rather find out for myself than to have people tell me how they think it is.

A hippie gets onto a bus and sits next to a nun in the front seat. The hippie looks over and asks the nun if she would have sex with him. The nun surprised by the question politely declines and gets off the at the next stop.

When the bus starts on it's way the driver says to the hippie, "I can tell you how you can get that nun to have sex with you." The hippie says that he'd love to know, so the bus driver tells him that every Tuesday evening at midnight the nun goes to the cemetery and prays to God. "If you went dressed in a robe and glow in the dark paint mask she would think you are God and you could command her to have sex with you."

The hippie decides this is a great idea, so that Tuesday he goes to the cemetery and waits for the nun to show up. At midnight sure enough the nun shows up and begins praying the hippie jumped out from hiding and says. "I AM GOD! I have heard your prayers and I will answer them, BUT ... first you must have sex with me." The nun agrees but asks for anal sex so she might keep her virginity because she is married to the church. The hippie agrees to this and has his way with the nun.


 After the hippie finishes he stands up and rips off the mask and shouts,"Ha! Ha! Ha! I'm the hippie!!"

Then the nun jumps up and shouts, "Ha! Ha! Ha! I'm the bus driver!!"

I don't know what it is, but everything in my life seems to be going down hill at a very rapid pace. I think i'm just cursed with bad luck. Like everything isn't fucked up already. Can't ONE good thing that I WANT to happen, come my way? You know, just a little good luck meh? maybe? I think I deserve something good! I'm pretty sure I deserve to be happy. (By the way, this has nothing to do with my son, I love him, hes 1 out of skim to none good things that has happened to me.) Is this what I have to look forward to for the rest of my life, bad luck? terrible relationships? (friends and significant others) loss of friends and family? I can see it now. I'm going to be about 50 years old with a son that is grown living his life, and i'll be sitting at home alone, probably knitting something. Gray hair, wrinkles and no luck, but bad. MANNN, i'm such and optimistic person. YEA! Maybe i'll get my break soon, maybe my luck and my life wont suck so bad. Maybe... If you like to give it a go on trying to make me happy, i'm accepting applications. Let me warn you, my life is tough, SO I NEED A SOLDIER! hahaha. seriously. You'll never live the life that I live I'll never live the life that wakes me in the night You'll never hear the message I give You'll say it looks as though I might give up this fight
My birthday is saturday.  If you'd like to buy me presents or give me money,  i will give you a blow job.  THANKS BABES
That's my Connor baby. Isn't he cute

My ankles are swollen, my toes are swollen, my hands AND my fingers are swollen.  9 pounds in a week from retaning water.  THIS has GOT to come to end soon, REAL soon.  I can't cross my legs without a struggle, going up and down stairs is like running a marathon.  Who knew being 9 months pregnant could make you feel like a 90 year old woman. I don't know what some of these women that say " I LOVED BEING PREGNANT!" were thinking.  I want the reward, not all of this uncomfortable painful bs.   Haha, and I think this entry reflects my hormones.  Oh lord, hormones.   ...only a few more days, only a few more days.... how about tomorrow?

Everything is not falling into place like I want them too.   It sucks, really bad.  Why can't I be content with my life, for once.  Why can't I be the happy one with everything I could possibly dream of.  I hope when my son gets here he'll take all my little problems away.  And make me feel needed and loved.  I'm such a sob, all I want is a little love man. SHEESH.

HELLO ERICA!  YOU SO didn't see that coming.  Yes you did, just didn't want to take it seriously.   Here you go again.  

please.. people.. i enjoy being used.  DO IT and i won't think anything of it.   COME ON!

I feel so used, so violated, I just feel like plain shit.  Maybe cause somehow I let everyone shit on me constantly and i just take it.  If i'm your friend and I love you dearly, i'm the nicest person you could ever meet, I'd do anything for you.   But somehow my friends don't consider that and just use me, well, I feel like i'm being used.  But how can I not.  I take people to work without hesitation I run people around all over because they're drunk and i'm the pregnant sober one, a good reason to have me around, eh?  It's like all my friends do is disrespect me. ( not saying i have never disrespected any of you) with the exception of maybe 1 or 2 friends.  It's like they're thinking "Oh she's the young pregnant one, we wont take her feelings into consideration, all she has to worry about is her baby, poor little girl."  I may be young and pregnant, but im not stupid, I see what goes on around me I hear things that shouldn't (but do,cause well hey, im pregnant) hurt my feelings.  I wonder what people will do when im not pregnant.

Another thing that has me upset, which I don't know why is when people call me "the pregnant one" or "mom" or whatever name that implies that im a pregnant loser.  It just upsets me incredibly, like I dont already know that im pregnant, like i dont already know im going to be a mom.  I know they're not doing it to upset me.  But it makes me feel like i have to grow up even faster than what I have.   I try to have fun when I hang out, but i just get so bummed about everything,  no one wants to come sit by me and have fun uplifting conversations with me.  Everytime I go hang out i just get upset.  

I just don't know if i'm ready for this whole parenting thing.  I mean i have no choice, connor will be here anytime now.  But I was in a relationship since i was 14, with the same guy.  And by the time i had the guts to cut it off with him I was already pregnant.  Honestly, i dont think i'll ever be in a relationship again, at least not til im 30 because lets face it, who wants to be with a pregnant chick, or a girl that has a kid?  Maybe when i move away i might find someone that makes me happy and will except the fact that i have a kid with another, and not take it like i want them to be the father.   Just maybe I will.   

I dont know, im just babbling now, and im extremely upset.  I didn't mean to make people feel bad or guilty (if anyone even read this)  I just had to get it off my cest before i exploded.

Starting tomorrow, when people ask me "So, when is your baby due?"  I can say "NEXT MONTH SUCKA!  

Word.

I don't understand why people think it's okay to make false accusations. AND LIE.  Whatever, people can think what they want.. i know the truth, that's all that matters.

It's quite possibly the hardest thing I have to do.  To sit here and try not to give a shit anymore, to let people make their choices, good or bad.  But at least I now know who my true friends are and who  I can rely on.  It's sad though, to know that a person you've been friends with for longer than 5 years and dated for 2-3 years.. if that 3rd year even ment anything.  And did anything for just totally up and blew you away, like you were nothing to them.  And being pregnant with their child doesn't make the situation better.  But like I said, i'm just going to sit back and keep myself or at least try to keep myself from being stressed, from thinking too much negativity.  For me and my son.  If Brandon wants to be like this and keep on with his little act.  He can go right ahead, i'm just not going to communicate with him until our son is born and to get my money, but I have people that can do that for me.  Unless he hits a growth spurt and becomes a man.  I doubt it though.  I just wish people would understand.   ..  i probably shouldn't say what i was going to say, just to keep me from stressing.  OOHH but how I want to.  

Could people make a promise to themselves to stay out of MY business, and MY business is my son, my problems, and whatever brandon has to say about me.  I would really appreciate it.  And if you hate me why would you want to get into my business anyway?  I tell my close CLOSE friends my problems.  But they don't get involved, the tell me that everything will work out for the better, they don't try to stick their nose in my business, they respect that.  And i think everyone should.  This is between me and brandon.  Not you amanda, not you jason.  Just stay out of it.  You have your OWN kids to worrry about.  Don't get into my life and believe everything you hear, cause we live in a town that likes to lie and start a lot of shit.  And not everything you hear out there is true. 




If you have problems with what I have just said, tell me.  Don't run off and tell everyone else and tell lies.  DONT assume things cause you heard it from this person who heard it from who the fuck ever.  thanks.

MY sins are being accounted for.  You know, i'm not perfect I have made plenty of mistakes in my day, and more are yet to come.  But at least I can admit it.  Being pregnant with someones kid that completely ignores you and hangs out CONSTANTLY with a girl that happened to be my friend, who also HAS A KID OF HER OWN, really really sucks.  I could care less if Amanda wasn't my friend.  If he went after someone else who was kid free and didn't ignore me or spend ANY time with me.  I would be fine and dandy.  HE makes me look like i'm such a piece of shit.  I'm not hanging out with or have feelings for any of his friends.  You guys are so commited to this rule that a guys ex can't date any of their friends.  But they can date the exes friends.  What the fuck?  I'm sorry, but I find this wrong.  And really heart breaking, ESPECIALLY to see the father of my child bring a toy over for someone elses kid, knowing that he only bought ONE..ONE thing for his own. RIGHT in front of me, gave it to her RIGHT IN FRONT OF ME.  I wanted to die right then and there.  Why am I the one getting shit on, why does everyone believe everything that comes out of Brandons mouth?  I've said a few choice words to Brandon, things like "I hate you" or "You're a piece of shit"  but nothing like he is saying.  Like i'm going to keep him from seeing his son.  PLEASE.  I grew up without a dad, I wouldn't put my child through the pain I went through and still going through.  It's just not fair.  I want Brandon to be a part of the pregnancy, but it's hard for me to know that he has feelings for MY friend (grant it, shes not much of a friend now) who has a kid and rather hang out with her than me.  It's not fair AT ALL that I have to sit here alone, knowing my babys father is not around.  He got me pregnant.. and now hes not around.   IT'S JUST NOT FAIR.  You guys can hate me all you want, but I know what I see, I know what I hear.  Call me liar, call me a hypocrite.. whatever. You people don't know me enough to tell me my sins are being accounted for.  You people don't know Brandon enough to think he is a truthful stand-up guy.  I understand hes a friend to people.  But what I say to Brandon, what I say about Brandon to the people I trust.  Should be between Brandon and I, and those view trustworthy people and I.  

If certain people can't at least UNDERSTAND my point of view, stay out of it. PLEASE.

You don't deserve this baby brandon..   you dont deserve the happiness my baby will bring.  You deserve shit.  and being with that fucking backstabber.. is part of this shit i talk about.  you guys deserve eachother.  go raise her baby together.   just make sure you TRY to atleast make time for your baby.  you fucking piece of shit. everyone thinks your soo fucking perfect. BULLSHIT.  you are lower than scum.  and she is a piece of shit as well.  dumb cunt. GAWD i hate you.

I know I'm getting lied to by my friend.. and by him.   I'm not stupid and im certainly not blind.    It would be better if you guys just told me the truth.. and prove how good of a friend you weren't.. and just to make my point bigger about YOU being a moron.  And I don't want you in the delivery room because I feel there should be trust  between the people in the room and me, there should be love thats unbelievably stong and commited.  And to tell you the truth I get that more from the doctors and nurses already more than I get it from you.  It's not like I don't want you in there for our baby, I don't want you in there because of me.  It will be about me for a while, the pain, the irritablity.. and you will probably just put me in more pain.  You can see him the second they clean him up and wrap him up.  Just not as soon as I do.  

You have a lot of growing up to do, and im not saying that I don't need too.  I do.   But you seem to still be stuck in that immature 16 year old body.  You think you don't have to go through this pregnancy with me.   You were involved in the process of making this baby. I think you should be here in the process of the development of this baby and watch it grow in me.  Feel him move.  See how happy he makes me.  Instead your with her, and her child.. your giving her child stuffed animals infront of me.  Not many people would think that is a big deal.  But it hurts me a lot.   You choose to be with her over the mother of your child.  And that distrubes me.. incredibly.  It makes me sick.  And if you continue this much longer.   I don't want you in MY life ever again.  The only communication will have between each other is this baby.  That's it.  No relationship, no friendship.. n o t h i n g.  And if thats the way you want it, you'll continue this childish act.  I have a feeling that you will.   so goodbye.

I caught you, in the act.  How dare you, oh my god Brandon, what are you thinking?



Me and Becca are going to Grand Rapids friday for a misery signals show.  I hate them.. but Becca wants me to go.. and hell, i'll be gone for the night.  why not?

1.  where the hell have you been spending the night.
2.  you better be going to work, mother fucker.
3.  stop telling people that I manipulate people. OH PLEASE
4.  stop telling people that I said I was going to keep you away from your son.
5.  oh boy.  you've blown it for the last time.

... expect a nice friendly phone call from me tomorrow.. and don't try to ignore my calls.
It's cool to lie to your friends...NOT.  Thanks guys, Becca and I really appreciate it.

You mother fucker.  I NEVER..NEVER said that I was going to keep you from seeing you child.  What the fuck are you thinking?!  Do you not want to see him?  You are a fucking piece of shit.  Seriously Brandon, why don't you go run your precious new car into a fucking tree.

I got you back.  You deserve every shitty thing and every shitty day that comes your way.
I hate you a million times more than ever.  And I hope you rot. 

Connor Eric MORRIS.  I like that.

FUCK YOU. You don't know anything. NOTHING.  I? I treat him like shit. OH FUCKING PLEASE.  Stay out of my business please

and FUCK YOU TOO, drink it up boy, your fun time is running out.  Mine ran out the second I found out I was baring your child. It's UNBELIEVABLE how you can manipulate people into thinking your this perfect person that has never made one mistake. Sometimes I wish I was still oblivious to the fact that you have this power, maybe then people wouldn't be screaming at me telling me I owe YOU an apologie. How I treat YOU like shit.  Fuck that. Fuck you.
I'm totally awesome at life. REALLY.

"TO THE REST OF YOU SORRY, INBRED, PEICES OF SHITS THAT WILL NEVER GO ANYWHERE IN YOUR LIVES WITH YOUR "I'M FROM GOSHEN THEREFORE I AM SUPREME" ATTITUDE, I'LL FUCKING
SEE YOU IN HELL."

Ah yes.  The infamous Christineb livejournal post.

OH no, not hell.

Why would moving to a big city make us realize that we are nothing?  What in the hell does that have to do with anything.  And if you are going to insist on making fun of goshen.. stay the hell out.  BEEYATCH.

IT'S A BOY!
I'm not upset at all, even though I really wanted a girl.  But seeing the ultrasound made me not care at all.  The only thing I really care about is how much cuter the girls clothes are than the boys.  But hey he'll look better in the misftits onesie.  haha.   I would post pictures but it would be from the dvd, and you wouldn't be able to watch it anyway.  You'll just have to come see it yourself.
xoxo

I'm out of Merit for awhile, but on June 7th through July 1st i'll be heading back, 8-12. Oh well, it's only for a few weeks and I really need all the school time I can get.  I also went to the doctor yesterday.  Did the usual pee in the cup and listen to the heartbeat.  On the 17th of June i'll be able to see what it is. It's funny how you think you have real friends that would do anything for you, and not think about ditching you for a second. ... THEN you realize, you thought wrong.    Seriously, whats the point in even having friends.  YES i do have some friends that i KNOW wouldn't shade out on me or anyone else that is supposed to be their friend.  But some doesn't add up to much.    I used to love hanging out with everyone, cause i know everyone liked eachother and there was never any problems.   And  I never minded new people coming to hang out every now and then.  But, not anymore.  It sucks to think how big of an influence people can have on other people.   

and im not the only one that feels this way.  

Im glad daniel and justin came up to pary and see everyone, never knowing that the people they wanted to see the most wasn't even going to hang out with them.

real cool.
